lyrics.text:
Si’i kāinga ‘alu hē,
‘Oku fai pe homou ui:
“Foki kia Sīsū ē,
Ka mou ma’u pē ‘a e mo’ui,
‘I he ta’ata’a ma’onga
‘O e Lami Matenoa.”

Ko e ta’ata’a ko ia
Na’e lilingi he ‘Akau,
Ke pālutu ai ‘a e hia,
Ko e toto fakalanu:
Uku ko e angahala
Ake kuo fakama’a.

Kovinānite fo’ou
‘Oku tu’u he Tohitapu:
“Te u afuhi kimoutolu
‘Aki ‘a e vai fakalanu:
Ho’mou ‘uli naʻe maʻa,
Ho’mou ‘aitoli ‘e tā.”

Sīsū, Taula’eiki Lahi
‘Alo’ofa kia au;
Papitaiso ‘i he vai
Ko e Laumālie Tapu:
Pea u hū he pule’anga,
Nofo mo e loto ma’a.
